ClientAuthenticationEntryPoint - Class in org.pac4j.springframework.security.web
This entry point redirects the user to the provider.
ClientAuthenticationEntryPoint() - Constructor for class org.pac4j.springframework.security.web.ClientAuthenticationEntryPoint
 
ClientAuthenticationFilter - Class in org.pac4j.springframework.security.web
This filter handles callbacks after authentication from the provider.
ClientAuthenticationFilter(String) - Constructor for class org.pac4j.springframework.security.web.ClientAuthenticationFilter
Define the suffix url on which the filter will listen for HTTP requests.
ClientAuthenticationFilter() - Constructor for class org.pac4j.springframework.security.web.ClientAuthenticationFilter
 
ClientAuthenticationProvider - Class in org.pac4j.springframework.security.authentication
This provider authenticates credentials stored in ( ClientAuthenticationToken) to get the user profile and finally the user details (and authorities).
ClientAuthenticationProvider() - Constructor for class org.pac4j.springframework.security.authentication.ClientAuthenticationProvider
 
ClientAuthenticationToken - Class in org.pac4j.springframework.security.authentication
This token represents a credentials: ClientAuthenticationToken.credentials, a client name: ClientAuthenticationToken.clientName, a user profile: ClientAuthenticationToken.userProfile and an optional user (details): ClientAuthenticationToken.userDetails.
ClientAuthenticationToken(Credentials, String) - Constructor for class org.pac4j.springframework.security.authentication.ClientAuthenticationToken
 
ClientAuthenticationToken(Credentials, String, UserProfile, Collection<? extends GrantedAuthority>) - Constructor for class org.pac4j.springframework.security.authentication.ClientAuthenticationToken
 
ClientAuthenticationToken(Credentials, String, UserProfile, Collection<? extends GrantedAuthority>, UserDetails) - Constructor for class org.pac4j.springframework.security.authentication.ClientAuthenticationToken
 
commence(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, AuthenticationException) - Method in class org.pac4j.springframework.security.web.ClientAuthenticationEntryPoint
 
CopyRolesUserDetailsService - Class in org.pac4j.springframework.security.authentication
This service copies roles creates user details containing authorities based on the roles from the token's userProfile.
CopyRolesUserDetailsService() - Constructor for class org.pac4j.springframework.security.authentication.CopyRolesUserDetailsService
